content: What an epic article. Better than the decent movie it references and supports. I’d like to add an additional item to the “Purpose” block, related to the “Conquest/Expansionism” choice, but different. In the sci-fi novel Three Body Problem by prodigious Chinese novelist Liu Cixin, an alien civilization comes to Earth for purposes solely related to self defense. Saying any more would give too much away to folk who haven’t read it yet, but I’d consider self defense an entirely different motivation vs. conquest.
